author: rse
msg: - anchors (<a>) are _container_ tags, the end tag is not optional
- headers inside anchors are not allowed, anchors need to be
- angle brackets have to written as < and > even inside <pre>

author: rse
msg: Make pod2man from 5.004_04 more happy with this file by adding a NAME start
header and provide a few more information about the recently added APACI

author: rse
msg: Some adjustments for the CVS tree.
Doug: I felt free to make those changes because I thought
they are with your spirit. If I should leave my fingers away from those
stuff please feel free to complain.  My intent is to adjust anything
where I'm 100% sure its right to do it this way and to never touch
something without your +1 when I'm not sure.

author: rse
